insert into task (name,tableName,doMode,url,method,contentType,isTarget,paramMode,template,status) values (#{name},#{tableName},#{doMode},#{url},#{method},#{contentType},#{isTarget},#{paramMode},#{template},#{status})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update task set task.name =#{name}, task.tableName = #{tableName}, task.doMode = #{doMode}, task.url =#{url}, task.method =#{method}, task.contentType =#{contentType}, task.isTarget =#{isTarget}, task.paramMode =#{paramMode}, task.template =#{template}, task.status = #{status}, task.updateTime = now() where task.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from task where task.name like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or task.url like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') order by task.updateTime desc
